name: Beat Escape
description:
PS.: Please play in fullscreen because I could not fix the UI problems in time :)

Beat Escape is a rhythm game made in 48 hours for GMTK JAM 2021

Lore

You control 3 prisoners that have to stay in the beat rhythm to escape the prison

How to play

  • 1 TO 9 KEYS - Control the pickaxe of prisoners and generate different sounds
  • TOP RIGHT > If you miss 10 notes you lose all your life points
  • TOP LEFT > If the chain strength reaches zero, you win

Thanks for playing!
